Player History
Had first career hit on 4/1/1978, off Cleveland Benson (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1978, off Anthony Hawks (PIT)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1978...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Columbus on 4/2/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1980, hitting .484 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 4/8/1981...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1981...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1982...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/3/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
